title: Rescue the Grand Duke
content: ny broken doors blocking your way. Avoid the working door on the second floor. You'll be able to get at the chests inside from the doors ahead. There's a trapped man named Benryn inside the building. (quest Rescue the Trapped Man) He's behind the broken door nearest to the stairs. The other broken door on the second floor leads to the Counsellor, who you must speak to if you wish to advance the quest. From a goblin in their camp, you learn that the Grand Duke has been taken to Moonrise Towers. I
